data.description:
Pluto TV is your portal to watch 1000s of free movies and TV shows and 100s of live TV channels virtually anywhere, on your favorite devices. Stream now. Pay never.

Pluto TV is the leading free streaming television service to watch all your favorite entertainment for free. Get ready to binge fan-favorite movies and series any time you want for free!

Stream free reality shows, live sports and news, classic TV and blockbuster films. Laugh along with your favorite movies including Dinner for Schmucks, Good Burger, The Back-Up Plan and more. Watch hit TV shows like Yellowstone, Big Brother and SpongeBob SquarePants all month long.

Don’t miss new movies and TV shows streaming monthly. Watch TV networks and top content providers, including:
- BET
- CBS
- Comedy Central
- MTV
- Nickelodeon
- Paramount
- SHOWTIME
- And more!

Pluto TV is 100% free and legal. Download Pluto TV today!

Privacy Policy: https://privacy.paramount.com/policy
Children’s Privacy Policy: https://privacy.paramount.com/childrens
Your Privacy Choices: https://privacy.paramount.com/app-donotsell
Terms of Use: https://legal.paramount.com/plutotv/terms-of-use
California Notice: https://privacy.paramount.com/en/policy#additional-information-us-states
